sentences.sContent: The scan showed that she was expecting twins.
sentences.sCn: 扫描显示她怀了双胞胎。

sentences.sContent: ...Some law firms now use artificial intelligence software to scan and read mountains of legal documents...
...Google has made sure only to scan books that are out of copyright and thus in the "public domain" works such as the Bodleian's first edition of Middlemarch...

synos.tran: 扫描；浏览；细看；详细调查；标出格律

phrases.pCn: abbr. 检验胴体尤其是脑部新陈代谢的断层扫描（Positron Emission Tomography Scan）；正电子发射层析扫描（pet scanning）
计算机X射线轴向分层造影扫描图

words.tran: 扫描的；观测的；搜索的；扫掠的
[计] 扫描仪；扫描器；光电子扫描装置

trans.tranOther: a medical test in which a special machine produces a picture of something inside your body
